content: lion brand pattern # 50325 *clsu-ripplethrow pdf* skill level easy level 2 published in crochet fantasy knit it knit 1 simply creative crochet lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 5 colors 2562 yards total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 10 sts + 6 row = 4 10 cm in pattern 1 pattern repeat = 6½ 16 5 cm special stitch fpdc front post double_crochet pattern 1-row repeat work in color sequence as described in written pattern fasten_off and weave in ends to finish
